q1: Do you think Bayern Munich are a good football team?
a1: Yes, they seem to dominate their league.
q2: They are a great team, not top 3 but easily top 10 and top 5 occasionally but they are not consistent atall and dont have a real domestic challenge.
a2: I tend to agree with tis assesment of Bayern Munich.
